title: Pure Provence Natural and Organic Triple Milled Soap, Unscented, Organic Shea Butter,100% Vegetable Based Bar, Made in France, Paraben Free - 5.3oz (150g)
features: PUREST SOAP ON THE MARKET: 100% Natural and up to 86% USDA NOP Certified Organic Ingredients.
FRAGRANCE FREE ORGANIC SOAP: full-size & long-lasting bar for those with sensitivity to fragrances
BEST SOAP FOR THE MOST DEMANDING SKIN: nourish and soothe the skin with a rich and creamy lather
FINEST NATURAL INGREDIENTS: moisturizing organic shea butter, organic coconut oil & RSPO palm oil
NO HARSH CHEMICALS: Cruelty Free, No BHT, Phthalates, Ethyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, DEA, Soy, GMOs
description: Pure provence soaps are crafted in the south of France using only the purest ingredients. They are free of any preservatives, colorants, or chemicals and blended with essential oils or natural fragrance coming from botanicals grown in the region. Certified organic shea butter is added to leave your skin nourished and moisturized. Our soaps are triple milled to ensure a long lasting bar with a luxurious lather. Paraben, SLS, phthalate, and BHT free.
